description:
At least 10 people were injured in a clash between police and 20-party activists in the district town during the daylong hartal here (Noakhali) on Thursday morning. The shutdown was called in the district by the BNP-led combine protesting the killing of the Jubo Dal man Rubel. 
Witnesses said a group of 20-party leaders and activists, led by district unit BNP general secretary and municipal mayor Harun-or-Rashid Azad, brought out a procession in support of the hartal in the district town around 7:10am
